method.name: K Symmetrical Nearest Neighbor Classifier

reference.ref: R. Nock, M. Sebban, D. Bernard. A simple locally adaptive nearest neighbor rule with application to pollution forecasting. International Journal of Pattern Recognition and Artificial Intelligence 17 (2003) 1369-1382

generalDescription.objective: To perform a classification task by means of a modified k-NN classifier, employing a sophisticated rule to obtain votes.
generalDescription.howWork: A enhanced K-NN classifier.For each test instance, votes are recieved from its K-Nearest Neighbors and, in addiction, from any train instance who would accept the test instance as one of their K-Nearest Neighbors.

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: Clas-KSNN Dataset: iris (10 fold cross validation run) Training set: iris-10-1tra.dat to iris-10-10tra.dat Test set: iris-10-1tst.dat to iris-10-10tst.dat Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: default values
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the results/Vis-Clas-Check/TSTClas-KSNN folder the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= iris Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.04666666666666666 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.030550504633038947 Correctly classified: 0.9533333333333334 Global N/C: 0.0
TRAIN RESULTS ============ Classifier= iris Summary of data, Classifiers: iris Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.9703703703703703 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.9703703703703703 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.9703703703703703 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.9777777777777777 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.9555555555555556 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.034074074074074076 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.005925925925925913 Correctly classified: 0.965925925925926 Global N/C: 0.0
